abstract: Taliban suicide attack near Bagram Air Base in Afghanistan kills New York City police detective Joseph Lemm, who was on his third Middle East tour of duty.
lead_paragraph: Joseph Lemm, a New York City police detective, was among six American military service members killed in a suicide bombing on Monday in Afghanistan, officials said.

headline.main: New York Detective on 3rd Tour of Duty Is Among Dead in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: New York Detective on 3rd Tour of Duty Is Among Dead
